## getBufferAttribute() function

Returns a \[\[THREE.BufferAttribute\]\] created from a provided \[\[BufferAttribute\]\] object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getBufferAttribute(attribute: BufferAttribute): THREE.BufferAttribute;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attribute | [BufferAttribute](./harp-datasource-protocol.bufferattribute.md) | BufferAttribute a WebGL compliant buffer |

<b>Returns:</b>

THREE.BufferAttribute
